text: sansarani: waidyawarunge usaspela prathipala ahamu.
samaharan rata hara yama thoragathi.
mata danena widiyata lamathanige yali ipadima thamayi ape chuti nangi..
ul thiyunu katu kambi
eeta passe wayif me gana kiyala mokada karanne kiyala mahaththayagen ahuwa.
wassa thada nathi nisa kudayak oone naha.
magen honda parak waduna..
iraka rajaya me bawa anawaranaya kara gena aththe mosul nuwara, thrasthawadingen muda gena, eya yali owunge grahanayata nathu kara ganimen pasuwaya.
jayarupayak ganna thiyana mahansiya danne ee ganna ekkena witharayi.
rambautan waraya pamina athi bawata sakshi weyi.
mamath enna uparima uthsaha karanawa..
dan thun hathara parakma.."
dan soyagena thibenawa brawun, wayit, grin eewa pawa wisha bawa.
dahasaya wani luwi rajathuma ratak palanaya karanna apekshawen sitiye natha.
parana yalpanagiya ka්ramaya lesa salakiya hakke wyawastha sampadanaya wyawasthadayakaye mantha්riwarunta simakala wyawastha sampadana ka්ramayataya.
rata wikinima gana siyalu deshapalanagnyayan waga kiyanna oona.
ma wiyawulwa thaniwannata wimi.
ema awasthawedi polis niladhariyeku sathu gini awiyak kollakamata sakakaruweku uthsaha dara athi athara ehidi ema gini awiya kriyathmaka wi athi bawayi wartha wanne.
royal eke heluwali stag nayit prasangaya warshikawa pawathwana ekak.
obala ape samajika mudal aapasu denna, ewita apita ayinwenna puluwan.
thamath aya gayana karamin hitiye.
api jiwathwenne kohomada?
mulikama hethuwa paya 24 ta pasu leda miyagiyahoth kisima maranapryeshanayak karanne na.

nihandawa sitinawa misa wenas wiya yuthuya oba mese pawasiya buduhimi iwasime kalawa nodana kalabalayen hasirena noyek wadawala yedena api da ewanima pirisaki minis wagata erehiwa nangena badhaka dinumata maga soyanu wenuwata dhanapathiyan helana bombawalata madiwemin ahasyana yana hati balamin kimada, apa me karanne?
meka bauddhayan ge thisarana pansil walata samana karanna puluwan.
eeth mama mawa wikunanna kamathi nathi nisa ewani dewal karanne naha.
sama kasino balapathrayak yatathe balapathralabhi ha aramudal athi athara eya oonama deyak gewimata ho balapathrayak dina gatha haki thanpathuwaki.
mama kukulu mas uuru mas ehema gaththe passa dorin.
balannata ayyata welawak thiyennata natha.
meka thamayi ada sidu wemin thibenne.
mokada pali hodiye nathi akuru pawa uchjaranaya karanawa..
aniwa enawa :)
mada gahana ayata wagema paththaka inna ayatath mada wadena eka pamanayi wenne.

kese wethath me chakralekhaya awalangu kirimath samanga pasalwala pramanathmaka, wyuhathmaka saha salasumkarana kriyawaliya sambandhayen da yam yam badha mathuwima hethuwen pawathi durwalathawalata piliyam yodamin mawupiyangen mudal ekras kirime di owun wetha anawashya barak nopatawena lesa ema chakralekhaya nawatha sakas kirimata amathiwaraya upades laba di thibu thibu bawa da kiyayi.
punchi waraddak athi samahara wita jiwithe awuruddak dekak , kipayakma passata yanna.
ese wuwahoth oba, rate ihalama aparadha parikshana kihipayak nawathwannata gos asarthaka wu janadhipathiwarayeku lesa mathakayata ekwanu atha.
ethakota halape mage massina wage.
reya kriyadamayata patanganmak thibiya yuthu ya.
ee kiyanne dolarda yenda pawumda kiyana ekada?

wewara pola sandaha welanda kuti idiripath kirimata illum karana lada siwil pudgalayin hatada owunge bhanda alewi kirimata awasthawa uda kara dimata sewa wanitha eekakaye garu sabhapathithumiya wisin awasthawa salasa dena ladi.

kolam muhunu[sanskaranaya] kolam muhunu charitha, raja sabha, raksha muhunu lesa kotas thunakata bediya haki we.
dakwa langa we.

mema uthsawayedi madhya udesa pirinamu ekama injineru wishishtatha sammanaya wuye da meyayi.parisara sanniwedana pilibanda janadhipathi sammanaya samanga karthru sansada madhya sammana 4 k widya wyaptha sammana 3 k aapada sanniwedana madhya sammana 2 k labagena athi abesinha mahatha shri lanka parisara sanniwedana sangamaye lekam ha shri lanka widya sanniwedana sangamaye sabhapathi lesa katayuthu karayi.karthruta liyanna | mudranaya sandaha

dadi adhishtanayen yuthuwa jiwitha awadanama da daramin sathuru ilakka wetha piyasara kara rata jathiya wenuwen sathura nasimata ura dun, abhitha niladhariyaku wunada ohu abhyantharaye jiwathwana sahallu hasirimen yuth tharunaya pi්rayamanapa lesa ismathu weyi.
"jathika aarakshawa" namathi karanawa gana witharayi ee.
nithiyata pitin karana ghathana pilibanda eksath jathinge wishesha madihathkaru pilip alstan waha me pilibada soya baliya yuthu ya.
mi massan owunge ath wata wasa sitiyadi owuhu ee ee mi masi rajadahane wagathuga apa ha pawasathi.“mi masi pettiyakata thiyena wada kada pani gaththata passe masso janapadayen yanne na.

aarakshawa sandaha nithi pakejaya parlimenthuwen saha senet mandalayen sammatha kara janadhipathiwarayage athsatha sahitha anumathiyata yomukara thibunu athara me wana wita ohuge athsana eeta labi athi bawath 2009 agosthu masa 2wana dina wana wita ehi gasat niwedanaya nikuth karannata sudanamwana bawath apage aaranchi marga wartha karayi thawada ese gasat niwedanaya nikuth kala dina sita dawas 15kin pasuwa ema nithiya balathmaka we ee anuwa ethan sita ithaliye jiwathwana wideshikayinta aluth thathwayan rashiyakata muhunadimata siduwana athara aluthin ithaliyata pamini ayatada thamange jiwithaye wadi kalayak gewadamu parani wideshikayitada mema nithi ekase balapana athara wisheshayenma anarakshitha bawa saha koyi mohothe ithaliyen pituwahal wimata siduweda yana degediyawen jiwathwime asahanakari thathwayantada muhuna dimata siduwanu atha me siyallanta hethuwa loka thathwayan wenaswima nowa patu aathmarthakami deshapalana madihathwim pamanak bawath eewa iwasa wadaranawata wada eeta erehiwa aragala kirima pidanayangen midime maga wanu athi bawath awadharanaya karamu.
ee kathawa meseya.
hithune nathi nisa....

singappuruwe ,dhakunu koriyawe kaleth mekamayi.warajana karana ayawa pittaniyakata gena gihin pelata hitawala wedithabana mlechchathwaya oya ratawala sanwardhanaye sangawuna dukbara kathawa.apata ee rajakiya mlechchathawyan allanne na.2004 di parajaya kale ee mllechchathwayayi.mama nam gankabarayek.ape janathawa nosalaka harina deshapalana ha samaja kriyanwithayak aniwaryayenma parajaya wena bawa yali yalith kiwa yuthu na.

ema kathawata lak wunu pudgalayin itha naraka minisun bawatath, aya ganikawak bawatath, ohu narumayeku bawatath, yalith aapassata harimak nathi bawatath, ehi siti tharuniyata siya diwi nasaganimata hara wena karannata deyak nathi bawatath, owunowun wiwaha nowunahoth ee tharuniyata wiwaha wannata bari wenu athi bawatath, aadi lesa ape aya komentu dama thibini.
